name: 13th International Conference on Control, Modelling, Computing and Applications
content: 13th International Conference on Control, Modelling, Computing and Applications (CMCA 2024) will provide an excellent international forum for sharing knowledge and results in theory, methodology and applications of Control Engineering, Modelling, Computing and Applications. The goal of this Conference is to bring together researchers and practitioners from academia and industry to focus on understanding Modern Control Engineering, Modelling and Computing concepts and establishing new collaborations in these areas.
organizers: 13th International Conference on Control, Modelling, Computing and Applications (CMCA 2024)
